--mbx-toggle-icon-on-internal-color-ligh.description: Toggle icon internal color, when [dark mode](https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/docs/shared/props/#dark) is `off` and toggle status is `off`

--mbx-toggle-icon-on-internal-color-dark.description: Toggle icon internal color, when [dark mode](https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/docs/shared/props/#dark) is `off` and toggle status is `on`

--mbx-toggle-icon-on-external-color-ligh.description: Toggle icon external color, when [dark mode](https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/docs/shared/props/#dark) is `off` and toggle status is `on`

--mbx-toggle-icon-on-external-color-dark.description: Toggle icon external color, when [dark mode](https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/docs/shared/props/#dark) is `on` and toggle status is `on`

--mbx-toggle-icon-off-internal-color-lig.description: Toggle icon internal color, when [dark mode](https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/docs/shared/props/#dark) is `off` and toggle status is `off`

--mbx-toggle-icon-off-internal-color-dar.description: Toggle icon internal color, when [dark mode](https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/docs/shared/props/#dark) is `on` and toggle status is `off`

--mbx-toggle-icon-off-external-color-lig.description: Toggle icon external color, when [dark mode](https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/docs/shared/props/#dark) is `off` and toggle status is `off`

--mbx-toggle-icon-off-external-color-dar.description: Toggle icon external color, when [dark mode](https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/docs/shared/props/#dark) is `on` and toggle status is `off`
